Resources for large language models in audio AI

Related repos

  • open-source model for speech-to-speech and audio understanding
  • Survey of unified multimodal models
  • open source audio model for expressive speech and voice cloning
  • Text-to-speech engine for long-form audio
  • run large language models on any device
  • Text-to-speech library with advanced models in 17 languages (legacy models in 1100+), and tools for custom voice training
